Data.Title: Forex
Data.Title2: Major, Minor and Exotic Currency Parities
Data.ShortDesc:
Forex

The foreign currency is the general name given to the foreign countries' currencies in Turkish. Parity is the value of a country's currency against the currency of another country. The first currency in the currency refers to the base currency. The second currency is the opposite currency. USD / TRY is the USD base exchange rate, while TRY is the opposite currency. The value of the USD / TRY parity is the value of the US dollar against the Turkish Lira. For example; Assume that USD = 2, TRY = 1; The value of USD / TRY parity will be 2. 1 USD = 2 Turkish Liras is equal if we simplify it. The monetary policies and economic developments of the central banks affect the value of the currencies of the countries and create serious investment opportunities in the currency parities.
Data.SeoDesc: Parity is the mutual value of two currencies. General information about major, minor and exotic currency exchange parities.

Data.Title: Metals
Data.ShortDesc:
Metals

Metals are the names given to all goods and products in trade. The Forex market is the world's largest financial market, where you can trade on metals. Investment instruments, in particular gold, aluminum and silver; With the privilege of Ekol Global Markets, you can buy and sell in the Forex market.
Data.SeoDesc: In Forex markets; You can purchase and sell instruments such as gold, aluminum and silver with the privilege of Ekol Global Markets.

Data.Title: Indices
Data.Title2: Access to the World Stock Exchange Indices from a single platform.
Data.ShortDesc:
Indices

Stock Narket Indices,  is used to determine the general direction of the stock market. General exchanges of prices in each stock market are monitored through special indices. Stock indexes contain more than one stock and are a total value resulting from mathematical calculations where the performance of stocks is measured.
Data.SeoDesc: Forex Stock Exchange indices are used to determine the general direction of the stock market by moving from price movements in shares.

Data.Title: Commodities
Data.Title2: Access to Commodities from a Single Platform
Data.ShortDesc:
Commodities

Commodities, precious metals and metals are very important sources for national economies. Gold, which has been popular for years, is perceived as a safe haven by investors. In addition to the gold in Forex, silver, platinum and other precious metals that can be invested in palladium.

With Ekol Fx's fast processing platform, you can easily carry out your operations for 5/24 hours. Take the place of fast and secure investment in Ekol Fx and become one of the professional investors!
Data.SeoDesc: All commodities and products subject to trade are called commodities. Access Commodities from one platform and trade instantly through Ekol Global Markets.

Data.Title: Cyrpto-Currency
Data.Title2: Crypto Money is the basic electronic money or digital money
Data.ShortDesc:
Cyrpto Currency

Crypto Money is basically electronic money or digital money. But as in online banking, it does not have a physical equivalent. It is a currency that can never be seen or touched except for digital displays. Crypto coins are coins that can be transmitted from person to person and stored in fully secure virtual purses, not connected to any country or any authority. It is a global money transfer, payment and investment system that can be transferred from person to person, not from interbank. Crypto coins starting with Bitcoin have created their own market with many different types. Among these are Bitcoin, Litecoin and Ethereum. Crypto coins, which are used as a payment system in many areas of life, are seen as the financial system of the future.
Data.SeoDesc: Through Ekol Global Markets, you can make instant transactions on crypto currencies in the Forex market and request consultancy on your investments.

Data.Title: USA Shares
Data.Title2: Almost every country has a stock exchange in which publicly traded companies are traded.
Data.ShortDesc:
USA Shares

USA Stock; refers to one of the equivalent parts of the capital of a company. By purchasing shares of a company, you become one of the partners of that company. When you invest in stock, you should investigate the company's activities, indebtedness, growth expectations, profit status, dividend (amount of profit) and briefly everything about the company. You can benefit from stock investment by choosing successful, long-term and profit-making companies.
Data.SeoDesc: With the assurance of Ekol Global Markets; Perform instant transactions on a lot of stocks in the US Stock Exchange such as Apple, Microsoft!
